text: Brimsdown railway station is in the London Borough of Enfield in north east London. The station is in Travelcard Zone 5, on the Tottenham Hale branch of the Lea Valley Lines, 17 km (10Â¾ miles) north of London Liverpool Street. The station, and all trains serving it, is operated by Abellio Greater Anglia. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Enfield Category:1884 establishments in England Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia
title: Brimsdown railway station
